title: chunky slab
author: Lantz

comments.content: Berthold [City](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070723/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/city) (badly squooshed and outlined for tagline)

No kidding... It's frustrating being a graphic designer when you see all the squooshed and stroked letters out there. At least they didn't try to add a drop shadow too.

Thanks for the help!
